com.tobedevoured.naether.util

Class Notation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tobedevoured.naether.util.Notation

  • public final class Notation
extends Object
    Helper for converting the dependency notations: groupId:artifactId:type:version or groupId:artifactId:version
    Author:
    Michael Guymon

    • Method Summary

      Convert a Dependency to String notation of groupId:artifactId:extension:version or groupId:artifactId::type:classifier:version

      Convert a Map to String notation of groupId:artifactId:version or if type is present, groupId:artifactId:type:version

      Convert a Project to String notation of groupId:artifactId:type:version
      static List<String> getLocalPaths(String localRepoPath, List<String> notations)
